prompt: Re-write this music caption in three different styles. You can mix the order of the instruments.
inputs: This song includes Drums, Organ, Piano, Bass, Guitar, but without Pipe.
captions:
Style 1:
This song features the sounds of Drums, Organ, Piano, Bass, and Guitar, but without the Pipe.

Style 2:
This composition is comprised of Drums, Organ, Piano, Bass, and Guitar, but Pipe is absent.

Style 3:
The instruments used in this song are Drums, Organ, Piano, Bass, and Guitar, omitting the Pipe.
